title: Natural Balance - HAVENS Horsefeed USA
cleaned_text: No added sugars and completely free of molasses. That helps horses who are prone to laminitis, summer itch ad insulin resistance. Correct omega 3/6 ratio supports and promotes performance, fertility, stamina hoof, skin and coat quality and ability to concentrate. The high fibre level and coarse composition of the muesli stimulate chewing. A lot of chewing results in a high saliva production. Saliva neutralizes fluctuations in pH caused by feed. Therefore this muesli is particularly suitable for horses sensitive to stomach ulcer developments and/or stress. Spelt wheat with natural glucosamine. Glucosamine promotes development and regeneration of cartilage which is important for flexible and vital joints. Helps horses with arthrosis. Garlic is traditionally one of the most used herbs due to its many attributed positive effects on health. Garlic is also very suitable for horses that are troubled by insects, horseflies and flies. This muesli is completely oat free and therefore very suitable for horses that are allergic to oats and can help nervous horses. Ingredients: Wheat, Puffed Corn, Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Corn Flakes, Puffed Wheat, Linseed Oil, Wheat Bran, Soybean Hulls, Calcium Carbonate, Carrot Flakes, Barley, Sunflower Seed Meal, Dried Beet Pulp, Garlic Flakes, Soybean Oil, Salt, Monocalcium Phosphate, Magnesium Oxide, Vegetable Oil, Vitamin A Supplement, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Chloride, Iron Sulfate, Copper Sulfate, Zinc Sulfate, Manganous Oxide, Cobalt Carbonate, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Selenite Copyright © 2023 Havens Horsefeed - All
